actions.text: Amendment SA 154 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 90.

Amendment SA 154 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Portman. (consideration: CR S2311-2319; text: CR S2313) To require the Congressional Budget Office to include macroeconomic feedback scoring of tax legislation.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 154 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 90.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 154 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 90.

purpose: To require the Congressional Budget Office to include macroeconomic feedback scoring of tax legislation.
